greet.name: greet

metadata.author: Test Author
metadata.description: A friendly greeting command with customizable messages

greet.execute: async function(interaction) { const message = interaction.options.getString('message') || 'Hello'; const user = interaction.options.getUser('user'); const target = user ? user.toString() : 'everyone'; await interaction.reply({ content: `${message}, ${target}!` }); }

poll.name: poll

metadata.author: Test Author
examples: /poll Should we have a movie night?
